title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:1.  Open the library outline view.2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observation: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead.

Expected behavior: When I select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it should be selected and the focus should remain on that selected item.

Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.2. Select any item in the outline view for the first time.
